Context:
The George Brown Alumni network has over 260,000 members and offers support for retirees who want to learn about the transition to retirement. The Association provides daytime programs of a cultural and educational nature, with general interest courses offered in fall and winter, usually lasting 10 weeks. The Great Treasures lecture series takes place in spring and fall. The Association is open to individuals 55 and over.

Contact information:
